definitions.definition: Either of two poles with footrests that allow someone to stand or walk above the ground; used mostly by entertainers .
A tall pillar or post used to support some structure ; often above water .
Any of various wading birds of the genera Himantopus and Cladorhynchus , related to the avocet , that have extremely long legs and long thin bills .

main_definition: Either of two poles with footrests that allow someone to stand or walk above the ground; used mostly by entertainers .
secondary_definitions: A tall pillar or post used to support some structure ; often above water .
Any of various wading birds of the genera Himantopus and Cladorhynchus , related to the avocet , that have extremely long legs and long thin bills .
